title: History
paragraphs:
Onward has been in offshore compliance since 2010 so the progression to Authorized Service Provider for audits is natural one.

Our team has a combined 300+ years of experience in the Oil and Gas Sector.

title: Understand
paragraphs: We differ from other audit providers as oil and gas is our specialty. Our team of qualified and competent auditors are oil and gas professionals first. We understand that a management system for an offshore operator is not the same as someone in food processing, or steel manufacturing.
